DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the effect of BMS-790052 on the pharmacokinetics of Ortho Tri-Cyclen® in healthy female subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Assess the Effect of BMS-790052 on the Pharmacokinetics of Ortho Tri-Cyclen® in Healthy Female Subjects
DOC.criteria: Key Healthy female subjects, 1845 years, BMI 1832 kg/m². Must be using an adequate method of contraception to avoid pregnancy throughout the study. Key Abnormal Pap smear within 1 yr of dosing, and abnormal menstrual cycle during the 3 months prior to enrollment. Any significant or chronic uncontrolled medical illness.
